name: NSQIP_INFO
description: The NSQIP_INFO table contains NSQIP registry data for the surgeries that are selected for NSQIP submission.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_NAME
columns.description: The registry record name.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the record status (hidden, soft-deleted, etc...).

columns.name: REGISTRY_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the registry associated with this RDI record.

columns.name: REGISTRY_ID_REGISTRY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the registry record.

columns.name: REGISTRY_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the type of registry. For this table the value will always be 20000 corresponding to ACS NSQIP.
entries: Physician Quality Reporting Registry Summary - Full Year
Physician Quality Reporting Registry Summary - Half Year
Physician Quality Reporting EHR Summary - Full Year
UNOS Pancreas and Pancreas Islets Candidate Registration
Australian and New Zealand Pediatric Intensive Care Registry
Australian and New Zealand Neonatal Network
American Heart Association Get With The Guidelines - Stroke
IRF Risk Adjustment ICD-10 to HCC Mappings
Scoring System Deferral User Interface Configuration

columns.name: REG_OVRIDE_CONTEXT
columns.description: The override context string to identify the correct override record for the registry settings record (HFR).

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient associated with this registry record.

columns.name: PAT_DATE
columns.description: The date of patient encounter linked to the surgery.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgery associated with this registry record.

columns.name: NSQIP_CYCLE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the cycle number assigned to the case. A cycle number is assigned to every eight consecutive days in a calendar year. It is automatically generated based on the operation date.

columns.name: NSQIP_IDN
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient in the ACS NSQIP database.

columns.name: NSQIP_LMRN
columns.description: The Medical Record Number (MRN) of the patient as assigned by the hospital.

columns.name: NSQIP_DOB_DT
columns.description: The patient's date of birth.

columns.name: NSQIP_GENDER_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the gender of the patient.

columns.name: NSQIP_RACE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the race of the patient. Starting with the January 2021 specification updates, discrete race categories are now located in the column NSQIP_RACES.NSQIP_RACES_C.
entries: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

columns.name: NSQIP_HISPANIC_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is of Hispanic or Latino ethnicity.

columns.name: NSQIP_NAME_FIRST
columns.description: The patient's first name.

columns.name: NSQIP_NAME_MI
columns.description: The patient's middle initial.

columns.name: NSQIP_NAME_LAST
columns.description: The patient's last name.

columns.name: NSQIP_ADDRESS_LINE_1
columns.description: Line 1 of the patient's address.

columns.name: NSQIP_ADDRESS_LINE_2
columns.description: Line 2 of the patient's address.

columns.name: NSQIP_CITY
columns.description: The patient's city.

columns.name: NSQIP_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the state of the patient.

columns.name: NSQIP_ZIP
columns.description: The patient's ZIP code.

columns.name: NSQIP_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the country of the patient.
entries: South Georgia and South Sandwich Islands

columns.name: NSQIP_COUNTY
columns.description: The patient's county.

columns.name: NSQIP_HOME_PHONE
columns.description: The patient's home phone number.

columns.name: NSQIP_WORK_PHONE
columns.description: The patient's work phone number.

columns.name: NSQIP_CELL_PHONE
columns.description: The patient's cell phone number.

columns.name: NSQIP_PREF_LANG_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the preferred language of the patient.

columns.name: NSQIP_PRIN_PROC_PANEL
columns.description: The panel number corresponding to the NSQIP principal operative procedure. It is used along with procedure ID from NSQIP_PRIN_PROC_ID to identify the row in OR_LOG_ALL_PROC table corresponding to the NSQIP principal operative procedure.

columns.name: NSQIP_PRIN_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure record corresponding to the NSQIP principal operative procedure. It is used along with panel number from NSQIP_PRIN_PROC_PANEL to identify the row in OR_LOG_ALL_PROC table corresponding to the NSQIP principal operative procedure.

columns.name: NSQIP_PRIN_PROC_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: NSQIP_PRIN_PROC_CPT
columns.description: The CPT code of the principal NSQIP procedure.

columns.name: NSQIP_PRIN_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the principal operative procedure.

columns.name: NSQIP_ADMSN_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the admission status of the case (inpatient or outpatient).

columns.name: NSQIP_ELECTIVE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the surgical case is considered an elective case.

columns.name: NSQIP_ORIGIN_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the origin status of the case. It indicates whether the patient was admitted from their home or from another type of facility.
entries: Nursing home / Chronic care / Intermediate care

columns.name: NSQIP_ADMSN_DT
columns.description: The date the patient was admitted to the hospital for the principal operative procedure.

columns.name: NSQIP_OPERATION_DT
columns.description: The date the patient entered the surgical suite for the principal operative procedure.

columns.name: NSQIP_PRIN_ANES_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the principal anesthesia type of the case.

columns.name: NSQIP_SPECIALTY_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the surgical specialty of the case.

columns.name: NSQIP_EMERG_CASE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the surgical case is considered an emergency case.

columns.name: NSQIP_WOUND_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the wound classification of the surgical wound at the time of principal operative procedure.

columns.name: NSQIP_WOUND_CLOSE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the wound closure associated with the surgical wound at the time of principal operative procedure.
entries: All layers of incision (deep and superficial) fully closed
Only deep layers closed; superficial left open
No layers of incision are surgically closed

columns.name: NSQIP_ASA_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the ASA class associated with the case.

columns.name: NSQIP_PROC_START_DTTM
columns.description: The time the principal operative procedure began.

columns.name: NSQIP_PROC_FINISH_DTTM
columns.description: The time the principal operative procedure was completed.

columns.name: NSQIP_LABS_ALL_UNKNOWN_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether all preop labs are unknown.

columns.name: NSQIP_HEIGHT
columns.description: The patient's height.

columns.name: NSQIP_HEIGHT_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the unit of the height entered in the height column.

columns.name: NSQIP_HEIGHT_UNKNOWN_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient's height is unknown.

columns.name: NSQIP_WEIGHT
columns.description: The patient's weight.

columns.name: NSQIP_WEIGHT_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the unit of the weight entered in the weight column.

columns.name: NSQIP_WEIGHT_UNKNOWN_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient's weight is unknown.

columns.name: NSQIP_DIABETES_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the diabetes mellitus variable. It determines whether the patient had diabetes mellitus that required therapy with non-insulin agents or insulin.

columns.name: NSQIP_SMOKER_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient was a smoker within 12 months prior to surgery.

columns.name: NSQIP_DYSPNEA_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the dyspnea variable. It determines the usual and typical level of dyspnea.

columns.name: NSQIP_FHS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the Functional Health Status variable. It determines the best functional status of self-care as demonstrated by the patient prior to the onset of acute illness.

columns.name: NSQIP_VENT_DEP_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient required ventilator-assisted respirations within 48 hours prior to the principal operative procedure.

columns.name: NSQIP_COPD_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient suffered from Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) prior to surgery.

columns.name: NSQIP_ASCITES_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient had fluid accumulation in the abodmen due to advanced liver disease or malignancy prior to surgery.

columns.name: NSQIP_CHF_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient had newly diagnosed Congestive Heart Failure (CHF) or a diagnosis of chronic CHF prior to surgery.

columns.name: NSQIP_HYPERTENSION_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient had hypertension that required medication prior to surgery.

columns.name: NSQIP_ARF_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient had renal compromise within 24 hours prior to surgery.

columns.name: NSQIP_DIALYSIS_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient required dialysis two weeks prior to surgery.

columns.name: NSQIP_CANCER_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient had advanced malignancy reflecting serious physiologic compromise.

columns.name: NSQIP_OPEN_WOUND_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient had an open wound prior to surgery.

columns.name: NSQIP_STEROID_USE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient was receiving long-term pharmaceutical immunosuppresants.

columns.name: NSQIP_WEIGHT_LOSS_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient had 10% decrease in body weight in the six month interval prior to surgery.

columns.name: NSQIP_BLEEDING_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient was at an increased risk for bleeding prior to surgery due to a hematologic disorder or chronic anticoagulation.

columns.name: NSQIP_PREOP_TRANSFUSION_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient received a preop blood transfusion.

columns.name: NSQIP_SEPSIS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the sepsis variable. It determines the most significant level of sepsis prior to surgery.

columns.name: NSQIP_WCN
columns.description: The Web Case Number (WCN) ID of the NSQIP case.

columns.name: NSQIP_FOLLOW_UP_30_DAYS_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the case was followed for the full 30 days.

columns.name: NSQIP_FOLLOW_UP_NUM_DAYS
columns.description: The number of days the case was followed. It is used only if the case was not followed for full 30 days.

columns.name: NSQIP_NUM_PHONE_ATTEMPTS
columns.description: The number of phone attempts that were done to follow the case. It is used only if the case was not followed for full 30 days.

columns.name: NSQIP_NUM_LETTER_ATTEMPTS
columns.description: The number of letter attempts that were done to follow the case. It is used only if the case was not followed for full 30 days.

columns.name: NSQIP_POST_OCCURRENCE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the postoperative occurrence was present.

columns.name: NSQIP_DISCHG_DT
columns.description: The acute hospital discharge date.

columns.name: NSQIP_DISCHG_DEST_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the discharge destination.

columns.name: NSQIP_DISCHG_POSTOP_ICD9
columns.description: The ICD-9 code associated with the postoperative discharge.

columns.name: NSQIP_DISCHG_STILL_HOSP_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient was still in hospital 30 days after surgery.

columns.name: NSQIP_DISCHG_DEATH_LT_30_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the death occurred during operation or within 30 days of procedure.

columns.name: NSQIP_DISCHG_DEATH_GT_30_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the postoperative death occurred more than 30 days after procedure.

columns.name: NSQIP_DISCHG_DEATH_DT
columns.description: The date of death.

columns.name: NSQIP_DISCHG_DEATH_UNKWN_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the date of death is unknown.

columns.name: NSQIP_FST_REOP_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient returned to the OR within 30 days after principal procedure for the first reoperation.

columns.name: NSQIP_FST_REOP_DT
columns.description: The date the patient returned to the OR for the first reoperation.

columns.name: NSQIP_FST_REOP_DT_UNKWN_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the date of the first return to the OR is not known.

columns.name: NSQIP_FST_REOP_RELATED_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID of the value that indicates whether the first return to the OR was related to principal operative procedure.

columns.name: NSQIP_SEC_REOP_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient returned to the OR within 30 days after principal procedure for the second reoperation.

columns.name: NSQIP_SEC_REOP_DT
columns.description: The date the patient returned to the OR for the second reoperation.

columns.name: NSQIP_SEC_REOP_DT_UNKWN_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the date of the second return to the OR is not known.

columns.name: NSQIP_SEC_REOP_RELATED_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID of the value that indicates whether the second return to the OR was related to principal operative procedure.

columns.name: NSQIP_REOP_MORE_THAN_TWO_YN
columns.description: Indicates if there were more than two unplanned returns to the OR.

columns.name: NSQIP_DISCHG_POSTOP_ICD10
columns.description: The ICD-10 code associated with the postoperative discharge.

columns.name: NSQIP_ENC_NUM
columns.description: The encounter number associated with the NSQIP case. It is an additional optional unique tracking number that hospitals can use for NSQIP cases.

columns.name: NSQIP_READMISSION_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient was readmitted. 'Y' indicates that the patient was readmitted. 'N' indicates that the patient was not readmitted.

columns.name: NSQIP_DISCHG_TRANS_HLC_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient was transferred to a higher level of care. 'Y' indicates that the patient was transferred to a higher level of care. 'N' indicates that the patient was not transferred to a higher level of care.
